Articles.Content: This is a new model I made, was not fond of the original one I made, so this one is my best work so far. Hopefully there is no problem with it.

Many thanks! And please tell if you encounter problems. I\'m still learning how things work in KSP

Thanks again!
At first glance I thought it were a storm troopers head!
ROFL. well can always say that the designer has a specialty in making helmets you should see MK2 pod, that one looked totally like a helmet from the cartoon M.A.S.K
Why don\'t you have your parts in a single thread???

Well this is a new design, not exactly something I would put in a same tread as the other, but maybe it is best in the future to hold all my mods in 1 tread. Guess it will also be a little better that way.
